CustomField.description: Assigns a numerical value 1-5 based on the selection in the "Probability" field.
CustomField.formula: CASE(ampi__Probability__c, "Very Unlikely",1, "Unlikely",2, "May Occur",3, "Likely",4, "Very Likely",5, "Muy Poco Probable",1, "Poco Probable",2, "Podria Ocurrir",3, "Probable",4, "Muy Probable",5, 0)
CustomField.label: Probability Value
